website_summaries.verdict: A mountain bike brake that delivers outstanding heat dissipation and durability.
pros: Red copper and resin fiber brake pads can heat up to 650°F
Stainless-steel rotors are smooth and flat
Simple to install, even for novices
Features dual pad adjusters with floating pad holders

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a simple upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for a decent price. I mounted these on a Specialized Hotrock 20 mountain bike for my kid. The bike came with V Brakes but had the mounts on the frame and fork to support Disc. I had to order a wheelset with Disc hubs to complete it. I have a feeling I will be buying a new back tire for the bike as it stops so good the wheel can be locked up to skid! I won't worry about wet rims being a problem anymore either! Mechanical brakes can be difficult to tune and they need to be broken in as well, then re-adjusted. Plenty of videos online to refine your skills!
customer_reviews.author: urbantaco

customer_reviews.title: Buy new pads ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Construction of the brake caliper is decent. The levers feel nice as well. What scared me was the brake pads themselves are dangerously ineffective. If you attempt to brake any harder than moderate or maintain brakes for any amount of time (downhill), they break down and fail. After using the pads for about 2 weeks, I ate all the way through the pad material. where this is scary is the brakes are not hydraulic so when you lose pad material that fast, the levers become more and more loose til pulling the lever all the way does nothing until you re-adjust the system.
customer_reviews.author: Er H.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace the Tektro Iox cable disk brakes. They are almost a copy of the IOX caliper. After installation they worked at first, then I took the bike in for a complete tuneup at a bike shop. The brakes worked for one time then would not brake, the shop readjusted and they worked for a couple of times but when I got home they did not work. The cable arm is a very loose fit and wobbles to the side when the brakes are applied. I can not return the package because I did use the cable and the hand brake lever but I am very disappointed in the quality of the caliper.
customer_reviews.author: muckamuck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They work like a champ. Close like a vise. I had to use the mount that was on my last caliper for the rear, but that is not bringing marks down for me. I will order for another bike. Love them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steev

customer_reviews.title: I struggled to remove/install new brake pads
customer_reviews.text: The actual brakes and pads are not that bad and even the rotors seemed nice. However... 1. The paint was a little flaky. 2. The rear brake was crooked/ unaligned. 3. It is more than reasonably difficult to put in new brake pads. I could have easily ignored the paint. And the rear brake wasn't significantly unaligned to affect braking much. BUT putting in new pads was ridiculous. Otherwise, this would have been a 4 or 5 star product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Go Kart Stopping power
customer_reviews.text: Used these to install front disk brakes on my daughters new go kart im fabricating for her. This was almost a direct fit with very little modification needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for a 20 YO Masura Louise brake I was unable to get repair parts for. This brake set fit my Cannondale bike perfectly. This brake set works and will stop the bike. It is not particularly elegant, but also did not cost five times as much, or require bleeding as it is not hydraulic. Perfectly functional. This would have gotten 5 stars but the informational materials suggest that it is German made. It came from China. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my scooter I only used the calipers which are awesome, But the rest of the cat looks like it’s really nice quality also nice thick cables
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality for price and is great for mountain biking
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality for price and is great for mountain biking. Sturdy metal handles are comfortable and long lasting. Seems to have stood up to some pretty bad slopes so far but will update if something breaks. So far very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Bussiere

customer_reviews.title: Go hydro instead
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve gotten hydraulic ones instead. The pad quality is not great very noisy and short life span also the rotors are not great either sharp burrs on one rotor caused me to kill a pair of pads in 2 weeks. I guess their good for the money but again would rather go hydro
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are cool! But don't kid yourself
customer_reviews.text: These are cool! But don't kid yourself. You'll need to constantly tune them up. No matter how well you think you have them adjusted, they always misalign. They work, but the breaks will squeak like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for changing brakes
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a must for those who want to change their calipers and shoes...i DID NOT REALIZE that the calipers already came with brake pads already in them, so i bought brake pads separately, but thats OK, i will have a spare set when i need them
customer_reviews.author: Mark Frederick

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year and 2,500 Miles
customer_reviews.text: I commute to work by bike every day and the calipers in this set lasted for about a year, which roughly equates to 2,500 miles for my 10 mile round trip commute. They're currently at the point where intermittent failures occur during hard braking. I believe that my previous calipers, a set of Tektro Novela calipers, lasted for about the same amount of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade for my cheap Mongoose E-fatbike
customer_reviews.text: These brakes work well on a cheapo Mongoose Malus with a Luna Cycles 3kW mid drive...they can actually stop that beast. The stock brakes were a joke. Four stars only because they squeal a little (but I'm probably pushing them way too hard).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesomr
customer_reviews.text: Awesome breaks it took me around 15 to put them on and like 30 min to get them perfectly setup (perfectly aligned )
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great product for
customer_reviews.text: If fit perfectly to my bike,great quality thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Pads go quick and squeal
customer_reviews.text: I like the look but I’m a little disappointed in the performance. I have to make 15 to 25mph stops and It does stop but it makes loud noises and squeals. And the pads go quick. I’ve had them on my bike going on 2 weeks and I’m almost in need of new pads.
customer_reviews.author: MEspada

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I replaced my old ones that squeaked a lot. No sounds yet from these. Be sure to use the right Torx bit to put on the rotor or you will strip out the heads. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well built, great looks, can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Revised, After receiving an exceptional customer service and a new set installed on my bike. I am more than happy with my purchase. The brakes are built extremely well. They look awesome on my bike. Happy customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: MountainRescue1

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great brakes.
customer_reviews.text: Good price point for product. Fitment was super easy. In stalled on a Transitions “Trail-or-Park” frame. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am utterly stunned how nice these are! I'm sure they are just repackage Chinese OEM brakes that would go on some entry level bike but, whatever they work well
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Remy

customer_reviews.title: Look before buying. Avoid if you don't have extra pieces and not expert repair person
customer_reviews.text: OK parts for how cheap. Box came damaged and missing parts. Came with a star bit screw's with not bit. Used old screws, since I was replacing old set. Just paying for what you expect. If you want something that will last longer then a few rides don't get this one
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive mechanical brake set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a set of hydraulic ones that fail. Sole, theses look nice. You do get a little noise, my hydraulic ones on my other bikes have zero noise. Could be cheaper pads. But I don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie MTBer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality disc brake system. I completely rounded out the allen key insert on the pad adjuster due to poor quality. The brake levers are also loose probably because the lever arm is held together with a pin that has a C clip on the other end. I can see the clip falling off on hard riding and losing your break lever function.
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: They don't brake quite as well as I expected, but they do work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: the rotors are still good, but
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few hundred miles. the rotating arms that actuate the cylinders wear out fast, and then you have no brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love these. I have them on a motorized bike
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these. I have them on a motorized bike. The cable retention loop snapped off when adjusting the cable.
customer_reviews.author: fliphouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to install. Looks great and works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great brakes at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Great brakes at the right price. I did not use the levers, I kept my originals. Very happy with these brakes. Much better thN the rim brakes I had before. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: shermane22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: strong brake. cheap way to upgrade an older bike without spending alot
customer_reviews.author: jim curry

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The first set was faulty and didn't work after a while but the company sent a whole new set and they work great. The customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The right brakes for the right price
customer_reviews.text: These folks are great. the produce is awesome for the price and they always keep their shipping goals. I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: TriCruiser2000

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: No. Broke after a week. Stick with REAL name brand Avid or Shimano calipers. Looks cool but that doesn't keep you from dying. I to them apart and rebuilt them but that lasted two days.
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit good and easy to adjust. Only problem I had was the cables included were to small.
customer_reviews.author: HNL

customer_reviews.title: I dont think so.. one costly lesson
customer_reviews.text: well that was a huge waist of time and money had to wait for what was never mentioned to get them to work .after getting here from China still dont work what a cluster flick. did get schooled on what not to do......
customer_reviews.author: Leucadiageorge

customer_reviews.title: Work great for urban ridding
customer_reviews.text: Work just fine for my urban ridding on my beach cruiser.
customer_reviews.author: RooR5mok3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price / complete set / bracket Great for the price. .
customer_reviews.author: Antonio tanco

customer_reviews.title: They are  perfect  replacement  for stock  brakes
customer_reviews.text: I like every thing about them . They are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look good not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bad material the rear break lost all treads with a simple torque.
customer_reviews.author: Juliocamacho

customer_reviews.title: They will eventually fail
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 60 miles they no longer engage the disc. Used on a daily commuter
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Tovar

customer_reviews.title: I got this for 2000 super v700 lefty rear rim
customer_reviews.text: I got this for 2000 super v700 lefty rear rim, It works fine, I'm not using the disk that it came with the kit because they are 6 bolt disc on and my rims comes with a 4 bolts disc
customer_reviews.author: Audon Ibanez

customer_reviews.title: Price does not equal quality
customer_reviews.text: Rear caliper failed to engage pad after a few moderate trail rides. Inner mechanism failed under normal riding conditions
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Everything is amazing Just the rear cable is litle small
customer_reviews.text: Everything is amazing Just the rear cable is litle small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work absolutely great for the price you can't beat them.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Cable could have been longer, but made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Phoink

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: i buy it 2 set but 2 broken so bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sooin park

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Bought these a while nack, finally got around to installing them and first time adjusting then they stripped out. Made of soft cheap metal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Rotors is great but the caliper kinda weak
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Made waird clicking sounds then stop working
customer_reviews.text: Front brake fail to work after clicking sound Was Heard Road approximately 20 miles usage on them
customer_reviews.author: Antenna stop working

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The response of the support team is fast and helpful. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product works great.. install was easy getting the breaks centered was easy great stopping power..
customer_reviews.author: Randy g.

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: I love the custom look of my wheels with the disc brake set up
customer_reviews.author: Zakendrae Turner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I finally got them after several weeks but can not mount them because I haven't received the mounting brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best disc brakes
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product disc brakes all work and i love it
customer_reviews.author: nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit had everything I needed to replace my old brakes. The brakes adjusted easily and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: John Collins

customer_reviews.title: Okay for now, but needs better handling.
customer_reviews.text: One of my discs was bent and the brakes squeal everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Elio Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Things whent together well but the paint did chip a little brake seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Stevenballer

customer_reviews.title: Works but needs some patience
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to crossthread the bolts but they did come with everything I needed. All parts are painted including the threads so be careful when installing. All adapters needed were included and mounted right up
customer_reviews.author: DWelch

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure About the Design
customer_reviews.text: Cheap but possibly an antiquated design. I've only used fairly inexpensive disk brakes on my MTBs but this particular model has an exposed silver retaining clip that I haven't seen before, this clip failure could lead to the problems some other customers are experiencing. Even if these brakes don't work out still a good deal for disks and brake pads.
customer_reviews.author: Prancer

customer_reviews.title: Good brakes update not safe
customer_reviews.text: Works great front brake cable a little short but made it work update 3rd ride with new brakes applied brakes snap noise no front brakes rebuilt unit put spring in place worked for awhile same problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont cheap out on Brakes
customer_reviews.text: installed on a 40mph Goped. rear brake broke as soon as it made contact with the disk. it just snaps back into the caliper and after taking it apart its fubar. Front loses adjustment no matter what you do to it. went on a 60 mile ride and speeds of up to 40MPH and over time i slowly lost brake pressure until nothing was left at the end. Went out about bought Avid BB7's
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Rear brake broke!!Don’t use for MTB!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rear brake stopped working correctly. If you are planning on using this for downhill mountain biking I recommend getting something better these brakes are cheap. The fact the rear broke while going on a downhill single track is extremely dangerous. Don’t put your life at risk with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeebus Creebus

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust them. They will fail.
customer_reviews.text: These might hold up to light duty riding. Heavy breaking will cause them to fail. I purchased two sets and only have one caliper that works out of the four.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: STOPyeah that's what you will do.
customer_reviews.text: Not my first choice of disk brakes but they will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Man

customer_reviews.title: Great disc brake set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great disc brake kit for a very reasonable price. Quick shipping and Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley C. Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price.
customer_reviews.text: I suck at adjusting brakes. These are solid. Good tension for mechanical brakes no worries!
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: well spend money, good quality and very easy to instal
customer_reviews.author: DELASCAR LASTRA MEDINA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work great once I got them all adjusted properly dialed in. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning: the brakes break easily
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good on the parts but the brakes, none of the bolts are hex ( Allen key ) and after a week of use the brakes stopped engaging and with a rebuild still continued to have the same problem
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: 26er 4 life
customer_reviews.text: Great looking disck breaks very durable a little heavy but great overall i cant wait to install them . Thanks afterparts.
customer_reviews.author: yosemity sam

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Good kit. Had to buy an adapter for the bike, but the brakes work like they should.
customer_reviews.author: Dthacker

customer_reviews.title: These brakes have a massive stopping power
customer_reviews.text: They work fine and they have a really good stopping power which I almost fell off my bike
customer_reviews.author: Carlos cuellar

product_meta.title: AFTERPARTZ NV-5 G3/ HS1 Bike Disc Brake Kit Front and Rear 160mm Caliper Rotor BB5 BB7 BB-5 BB-7
product_meta.description:
Features:
100% brand new, precise desiged, Germany TüV certificate high quality, MTB Mechanical Disc Brake.

Patten: 160mm 6 bolt Standard 44MM&22MM pitch-row stainless steel Disc.
Compatible: Fit for original BB5 BB7 Disc Brake Pads.

Front & Rear 160mm Rotors,Smooth power modulation and easy adjustability,metal ceramic pad compound.

Refitting for use with linear pull brake levers(Cyclocross Bike, Road Bike, Mountain Bike).Dual pad adjusters with floating pad holders.

Package List:
2 pcs Disc Brake Calipers with Levers(1.5M brake cable)
* Front 160mm Caliper Adapter with Pad
* Rear 160mm Caliper Adapter with Pad
2 pcs Disc Brake Rotors (front and rear)
1 set Brake Rotor Bolts

Our disc brake kits can't be used in below circumstances:
1. If your bike is a V brake bike, our disc brake kit can not work with a V brake bike.
2. Normally, the distance between holes of the disc brake is 22 * 44MM with 6 holes, if your bike is with 4 holes disc brake, it won't work.
feature_bullets: Germany TüV certificate high quality, bike mechanical disc brake kit.
12Cr13 martensitic stainless steel, 160mm 6 bolt Standard 44MM & 22MM pitch-row disc, perfect flatness and incredibly smooth.
Cold forged double bent lever blade, 85mm front and 145mm rear brake stainless steel PTFE coated cable.
Fits good and very easy to adjust and instal, no need with professional skills. Also, we provide straightforward user manual, help you install the kits like a breeze.
